description.en: After facing off the last of the Otsutsuki clan members a forbidden seal activates on the last descendant’s body sending Naruto back into the past before his change began. Naruto is back in the academy with a few days remaining before the academy graduation exam. Naruto now has the opportunity to relive either as a loser who became the hero or awaken as a reborn genius that surpassed all his peers and changes the future.

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

description.en:
Regaining the memories of his previous life, Cyril realised he was reincarnated as the butler of Sophia, an otome game villain. At the rate things were going, Sophia would eventually have the prince stolen away from her by the heroine, fall into darkness, and be executed.

Wanting to save the villainous daughter he was so fond of, Cyril moved to eliminate all the factors that would cause her to fall into darkness, raising her up to be a talented and beautiful girl who could win the prince’s love. However...
description.ja: 転生執事の悪役令嬢救済ストーリー、華麗に開幕！　乙女ゲームの世界で、悪役令嬢ソフィアの執事に転生した俺、シリル。闇堕ち→破滅ルートを回避すべくお嬢様を育てたものの、どうやら俺にほれているようで…!?　しかも、ゲームヒロインの登場や一緒の学園生活に向けて準備も始まり、破滅フラグはまだまだ健在のご様子。でもお嬢様の幸せのため、この最強執事が邪魔者全てぶっ潰します!!
description.pt-br: Cyril de repente se vê em um jogo otome (de garota) como o mordomo da vilã do jogo, Sofia. No jogo original Sofia tem seu príncipe roubado pela heroína principal, o que acaba lhe levando para o caminho da escuridão até o dia de sua execução. Para salvar Sofia e também seu próprio pescoço, Cyril terá que eliminar todos os obstáculos e fazer com que ela evolua para uma dama esplêndida para encantar o príncipe! Mas..

description.ar:
عرضت أريا عقد زواج. إلى الدوق الاكبر فالنتين الذي قيل أنه باع روحه للشيطان. حتى تتمكن من حماية نفسها ولويد [تزوجني] أعطته أريا مذكرة تطلب يده للزواج بورقة القيقب الصغيرة مثل يديها. [إنه عقد زواج ، لذا سنتطلق بعد 10 سنوات ...] أمسك السيد الشاب بالملاحظة التي كانت آريا تكتبها ومزقها إلى أشلاء. "إذن أين يمكنني ختمها؟" "أخبرتني أنك ستطلقني بمجرد أن نتقدم في السن." كبر الشيطان الصغير وقبل جبهتها. "منذ أن أصبحنا بالغين ، علينا بدلاً من ذلك إبرام عقد للبالغين".

description.cs:
"Ak existuje ďalší život, zachránim ťa." Aria je posledná siréna, netvor, ktorý očaruje ľudí piesňou. Spútaná je nútená spievať šľachticom, až kým nezomrie. Kým ju démonizovaný veľkovojvoda Lloyd Valentine oslobodí, je už neskoro. Už vydýchla naposledy... alebo si to aspoň myslí. Keď sa Aria prebudí v minulosti, zasvätí svoj život ochrane vojvodu, ale rozmýšľa, či je to naozaj všetko, za čo jej krátky život stojí. Bude niekedy slobodná? Alebo je táto siréna predurčená spievať navždy tú istú pieseň?

description.en:
Aria offered a contract marriage. To Grand Duke Valentine who was said to have sold his soul to the devil. So she could protect herself and him.

"Marry me."

Aria passed him a note which asked for his hand in marriage with her little maple leaf like hands.

"It's a contract marriage so we'll divorce 10 years later..."

The young master grabbed the note Aria was writing and ripped it to shreds.

"So where do I stamp it?"

"You told me you'll divorce me once we're older."

The young devil grew up and kissed her forehead.

"Since we have become adults, we have to instead make a contract for adults."

---
“If there is a next life, I will save you.”

Aria is the last remaining siren, a monster who bewitches humans with song. Shackled, she is forced to sing to nobles until she coughs blood. By the time the demonized Grand Duke Lloyd Valentine frees her, it’s too late. She has already breathed her last… or so she thinks. When she awakens in the past, Aria dedicates her life to protecting the duke, but she wonders if that’s really all her life is worth. Will she ever be free? Or is this siren destined to sing the same song forever?

---

description.fr:
Aria est la dernière des Sirènes, dont le chant ensorcelle les humains. Enfermée dans la cage de l'Empereur, elle doit chanter jusqu'à la mort. Lorsque le duc de Valentine, noble maudit et habité par un démon, lui propose de tuer toute la cour pour la libérer, Aria, déjà condamnée, accepte. Mais avant de rendre son dernier souffle, elle revient dans le passé, à l'année de ses dix ans. Saisissant cette nouvelle chance, elle va tout faire pour sauver le duc de la malédiction qui pèse sur lui...

description.id:
Setelah ibunya yang seorang siren meninggal, Aria menjadi burung yang terkurung dan harus bernyanyi untuk kaisar sampai mati. Di saat dia hampir mati, Lloyd, grand duke iblis datang dan membawa Aria keluar dari kandang burung. Saat itu Aria berpikir... "Kalau ada kehidupan selanjutnya, aku akan menolongmu." Ketika ia membuka mata, Aria kembali pada waktu di mana dia berusia 10 tahun. Saat itu dia berencana untuk melakukan pernikahan kontrak dengan Lloyd demi melindungi dirinya dan Lloyd.

description.it:
"Nella prossima vita, ti salverò". Aria è l'ultima sirena rimasta e, con il suo canto, incanta gli esseri umani. Rinchiusa ed incatenata, è costretta a cantare per i nobili fino al punto di tossire sangue. Quando il "demone" Granduca Lloyd la salva è ormai troppo tardi ed Aria esala l'ultimo respiro tra le sue braccia. Quando si risveglia, Aria si ritrova nel suo corpo di bambina di 10 anni. Decide così di prendere in mano la sua vita e di dedicarla alla protezione del Granduca, in segno di gratitudine per averla salvata. Ma Aria sarà mai davvero libera?

description.ko:
아리아는 계약 결혼을 제안했다.
그것도, 악마에게 영혼을 팔았다는 발렌타인의 대공자에게.
자신을 지키고, 그를 지키기 위해서.

[나와 결혼해.]

아리아는 단풍잎 같은 손으로, 쪽지와 함께 혼인 서약서를 내밀었다.

[계약 결혼이니까 10년 뒤에 이혼…….]

그러자 어린 대공자는 쓰고 있던 쪽지를 빼앗아 쫙쫙 찢으며 말했다.

“그래서, 도장은 어디에 찍으면 되지?”

“크면 이혼해주겠다고 했잖아.”

어느새 훌쩍 자란 악마 대공이, 그녀의 머리카락 위에 경건하게 입을 맞추며 말했다.

“어른이 되었으니 어른의 계약을 해야지.”

description.pt-br:
Sereias... um nome derivado de uma criatura antiga, usado para descrever aqueles que podem encantar, atrair, controlar e curar os outros cantando. Anos atrás, uma sereia chamada Sophia foi sequestrada pelo conde Cortez como sua preciosa sereia, e uma garota chamada Aria nasceu logo depois como sua filha. Sujeita a viver a vida de uma sereia, Aria experimentou, viu e ouviu muitas coisas horríveis. Outros fariam qualquer coisa para ouvi-la cantar, ao ponto da insanidade. O imperador, que ficou obcecado por ela, quebrou suas pernas e a trancou em uma gaiola dentro do palácio imperial para escondê-la e mantê-la para si mesmo. Despedaçada terrivelmente, Aria se resignou à morte, quando de repente - O Arquiduque Diabólico, Lloyd Cardenis Valentine, chegou e sussurrou: "Devo matar todos aqui? Se precisar de mim, é só me chamar. Sua música sempre me alcançará, onde quer que você esteja." No final, Aria chamou o diabo, levando a morte a todos os presentes, exceto ela mesma. "Vamos cair no inferno juntos." E com isso, Aria deu seu último suspiro e morreu... apenas para voltar a ser como era há 10 anos. Agora que ela tem uma segunda chance em sua vida, Aria está determinada a mudar seu destino, assim como o futuro cruel de seu salvador, o arquiduque Valentine. Ela lhe propõe um contrato de casamento, com o divórcio planejado 10 anos depois, mas ele tem outros planos...

description.en: "Millie" (golden haired), the perfect little girl whose life is fully equipped with everything, but because of her timeless mother, Millie has become an indifferent day-to-day person until she meets "Zen" (black-headed), an ordinary little girl whose life focussed on only studying, without Zen knowing that she herself was stirring up Millie's heart to beat again.
description.pt-br: "Millie" (de cabelos dourados), a garotinha perfeita cuja vida está totalmente equipada com tudo, mas por causa de sua mãe atemporal, Millie se tornou uma pessoa indiferente ao dia a dia até conhecer "Zen" (de cabelos pretos), uma garota comum cuja vida se concentra apenas nos estudos, sem que Zen saiba que ela mesma estava fazendo o coração de Millie bater novamente.

description.en:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.
description.ko:
최강의 무가 사미온에서 외팔이 방계로 태어난 데이븐.
반쪽짜리 무인이라며 갖은 조롱과 멸시를 딛고 사미온의 직계 천재마저 넘어섰으나,
결국 가문과 부모에게 버림받아 가장 초라한 최후를 맞이하게 되는 줄 알았는데...
500년 뒤 새로운 몸에서 눈을 떴다!

‘내게도 오른팔이 있다?’

새로운 가문의 적통.
천부적인 재능의 육체.
전생의 경험.
그리고 그와 함께하는 신까지.

환생을 했더니, 모든 것이 달라져 있었다.

altTitles.ja: 叛逆（はんぎゃく）のニジガサキ
反逆のニジガサキ

description.en: Hangyaku no Nijigasaki (Nijigasaki of the Rebellion) is an official Love Live! manga by Choboraunyopomi featuring the cast of Love Live!'s Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.
description.es-la: Las locuras y bizarras jornadas de Nijigasaki, ahora llegan en formato manga. Sigue las rebeldes aventuras de Setsuna Yuki y el Club Escolar Idol de Nijigasaki en Hangyaku no Nijigasaki.

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en:
Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. 
Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical Japanese entertainment. 
Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane takes her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br:
Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. 
Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. 
Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

altTitles.ja: 私だけに見せて欲しい
アイドル失格

description.en:
Keita, a boring university student, is a gachikoi (fan who's seriously in love) otaku of Mimika, the center of the idol group Tetra. Even though he's aware that it's a love that will never happen, he continues to push on with giving her his emotional support. 

On the other hand, as her group's popularity continues to rise, Mimika bears anxiety over the uncertainty of the future even while she's happy with the fervently cheering Keita's affection. 

One day, Mimika falls into despair after her mother gets into a traffic accident, and with the help of social media, she heads towards Keita's part-time workplace...
description.ja:
NMB48の安部若菜が本気で描く、禁断の「アイドル×オタク」恋愛小説を待望のコミカライズ！

冴えない大学生のケイタは、アイドルグループ「テトラ」のセンター・実々花の“ガチ恋”オタク。叶わぬ恋だとわかりながらも、彼女を心の支えとして推し続けている。一方、実々花は、グループの人気が順調に上がり、熱心に応援してくれるケイタの好意を嬉しく思いながらも、将来に漠然とした不安を抱えていた。ある日、実々花は母親との衝突をきっかけに自暴自棄になり、SNSの情報を頼りにケイタのバイト先へ向かってしまい……。

altTitles.ja: コハエースＥＸ

description.en:
A Holy Grail War has broken out in Koha-Ace!

After managing to avoid getting axed again and again, some miracle has allowed for a third volume of Koha-Ace! The mysterious new Servant designed by Takashi Takeuchi, Sakura Saber, is a storm of romance who will play an active role! We'll show you the real power of Koha-Ace. (Third Volume of Koha-Ace, following Koha-Ace+)

A transfer student desperately seeking someone to relate to pursues the attention of a mysterious boy covered in bandages, thinking he might finally be able to build a friendship for the first time since a tragic accident.

title.en: Watashi to Kanojo no Kawaii Koi no Hajime Kata

altTitles.en: How My Cute Girlfriend and I Started a Love Story

altTitles.ja: 私と彼女のかわいい恋のはじめ方
異世界のんびり農家

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Sống Nông Dân Ở Thế Giới Khác

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.ja:
闘病の末に命を落とした青年・火楽は、神様によって蘇生され、若返って異世界に転移した。第二の人生を楽しむため、授けられた『万能農具』を手に、異世界で掘って伐って耕して…。

**Links:**  

- [![](https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png) Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3289ds/)
- [Official LN (JP)](http://www.fujimishobo.co.jp/sp/201803nonbiri/)
- [Alternative Raw](https://dragonage-comic.com/product/nonbiri_noka/)
description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

description.fr:
C'était la première fois de ma vie.
J'ai passé une nuit avec un homme dont je ne connaissais pas le nom...
C'était un coup d'un soir avec mon futur mari.

altTitles.ja: オーバーレブ！

description.en:
Over Rev! is a manga about a senior graduate named Ryouko. A while back, she injured her ankle in a track meet. Since then, she didn't know what to do with her life, until she finds out about street racing…

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Over Rev** (2008)

title.en: Tensei Youjo. Kamikemono to Ouji to, Saikyou no Ojisan Youhei-dan no Naka de Ikiru.

altTitles.ja: 転生幼女。神獣と王子と、最強のおじさん傭兵団の中で生きる。

altTitles.en: Reincarnated Girl; Living With a Beast, a Prince, and The Strongest Mercenary Group

description.en:
Lise found herself alone in a strange meadow as a young girl. Also, there is a big dog in front of her. There wasn't a dog like that in the neighborhood, and that's when Lise was convinced. 

"I see... This is what they call reincarnation in another world!"

 Then, a group of muscular mercenaries appears in front of Lise. It seems that they have come to defeat this dog. But to her surprise, this dog is a divine beast! Ranagh, the divine beast, has grown fond of Lise, who is the only one who can understand him. So, the leader of the mercenary group, Arlagia, offers to protect Lise and Ranagh with his mercenary group...? 

A young girl, a divine beast, and the strongest group of mercenaries - a wacky otherworldly fantasy with a cast of unorthodox characters!
description.ja: 気が付けば見知らぬ草原にいた優乃。目の前には“神獣”を名乗る大きな犬と屈強な傭兵たち。しかも自分の姿はなぜか幼女に!?「なるほどこれは…異世界転生だ！」即座に状況を理解し、リゼと名乗ることにした彼女が魔法を使ってみるとチートすぎる能力が発覚！ 傭兵団に保護されつつも、ドラゴン狩りに出かけたり、竜巻魔法で新しい料理を開発したりとさっそく大暴れで…？
description.es-la: Lise se encontró sola en un extraño prado con la forma de una niña. Además, hay un gran perro frente a ella. No había ningún perro así en el barrio, y fue entonces cuando Lise se convenció. Ya veo...... ¡Esto es lo que llaman reencarnación en otro mundo!　Entonces, un grupo de mercenarios musculosos aparece frente a Lise. Parece que han venido a derrotar a este perro. Pero para su sorpresa, ¡este perro es una bestia divina!　Ranagh, la bestia divina, se ha encariñado con Lise, que es la única que puede entenderle. Entonces, el líder del grupo de mercenarios, Arlagia, se ofrece a proteger a Lise y a Ranagh con su grupo de mercenarios.....?　Una joven, una bestia divina y el grupo de mercenarios más fuerte. Una extravagante fantasía de otro mundo con un elenco de personajes poco ortodoxos.

title.en: Hakanai Kimi wa Moukou wo Hajimeru

altTitles.ja: 儚いキミは猛攻をはじめる

altTitles.en: The Fairytale-like You Goes on the Assault

altTitles.zh: 童话般的你开始了恋爱猛攻

altTitles.uk: Як у казці починається історія кохання

description.en: Kagari, an ephemeral beauty, reunites with her older childhood friend, Nana-kun, and begins her romantic assault on him.
description.vi: Một series siêu ngọt nữa tới từ Hazano Kazutake - tác giả của bộ Thánh nữ Cecilia và mục sư Lawrence. Câu chuyện về đôi bạn thưở nhỏ cứ tối đến là lại ở chung nhà để đảm bảo sự an toàn cho nhau...

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
description.vi: Cố gắng tìm kiếm tài năng, Senji Touya thử mọi thứ có thể để tìm ra nó. Kiếm đạo, nhảy múa, bơi lội, bóng rổ, bóng đá, cờ vua… bất cứ thứ gì cậu thử, cậu đều không thể vượt trội. Một ngày nọ, cô bạn cùng lớp của cậu, Haito, tới trường sau một thời gian dài vắng mặt. Senji coi cô là người "có nó" – một người có tài năng. Sau đó, cậu phát hiện ra rằng cô không chỉ là một người có tài năng mà còn là người đã "lấy" tài năng của mình từ kiếp trước. Và, những người "lấy" tài năng từ kiếp trước của họ còn được gọi là "Những Kẻ Trở Lại"…
description.pt-br: Na busca por um talento só seu, Senji Touya tenta de tudo para encontrá-lo. Kendou, dança, natação, basquete, futebol, xadrez… em tudo o que ele tenta, ele não consegue se destacar. Um dia, sua colega de classe, Haito, vem à escola pela primeira vez em muito tempo. Senji se refere a ela como alguém que “possui algo” ou alguém que tem um verdadeiro talento. Mais tarde, ele descobriu que ela não é apenas alguém que tem talento, mas alguém que “conseguiu” o talento de si mesma através de sua vida passada. E, aqueles que “conseguem” o talento de suas vidas passadas, também são conhecidos como “Reencarnados” …

altTitles.ja: 7日間限定彼女

altTitles.th: แฟนสาวแค่ 7 วัน

description.en:
A yuri romantic comedy centered on a temporary relationship between a gal and an honor student. 

The story begins when Manatsu, a gal who is on the verge of repeating a grade, starts receiving tutoring from Sumie, an honor student. Manatsu loves shoujo manga and romantic gossip but has the vague that having a boyfriend somehow doesn't fit her. 

When she casually brings this up, Sumie suggests, "Why not try starting with just the form?" and offers "How about dating me for just 7 days?"

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.en: I'm a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped into a Gyaru

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um Garoto do Ensino médio, mas troquei de Gênero e Me Tornei uma Gal

description.en:
Junpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.
___
 [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja: 陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
description.pt-br:
Shunpei, um estudante solitário do ensino médio, se tornou uma gal depois de salvar a deusa das gals de se afogar. Através das conexões de sua mãe, ele conseguiu transferir-se para uma escola só para meninas, mas estava cheia de gals!
 Todos os dias são uma sobrecarga sensorial para Shunpei, que nunca falou com uma garota, muito menos com uma gal.
 
 É o início de uma comédia escolar engraçada, com um cara introvertido do ensino médio => transformado em Gal.

altTitles.ja: ラブ・ユア・ラブエネミー

description.en: “I hate him, but I want this face all to myself!” Yousuke and Daichi, students at the same university, are romantic rivals for Mitsuru. However, as a result of a stratagem of Mitsuru’s, they get locked in a room and can’t leave until they have sex! The two love rivals. Yosuke kisses Daichi in an attempt to tease him, but to his surprise, Daichi has such a sexy reaction…!?

title.en: A Mother's Love, a Daughter's Prison

altTitles.ja: 母という呪縛 娘という牢獄

altTitles.vi: Lời nguyền của mẹ - Ngục tù của con

altTitles.ja-ro: Haha to iu Jubaku Musume to iu Rougoku

description.en: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaeko’s life? This series, based on a true story, will explore Hikari Miyagawa’s experiences up to her greatest tragedy—and what happened to her afterward.
description.vi:
Đây là một câu chuyện dựa trên sự việc có thật.
Một th... th... với đầu và tứ chi bị ch.t đ.ứ.t l.ì.a được phát hiện thấy bên bờ sông. Sau khi điều tra, cảnh sát đã xác minh danh tính nạn nhân là Miyagawa Yaeko, thế nhưng rúng động hơn, hung thủ gây ra vụ án dã man này không ai khác chính là Miyagawa Hikari, con gái của bị hại.
Được biết suốt thời gian qua, Miyagawa Hikari đã liên tục bị mẹ ép học hành quá mức, và đã thi trượt vào Đại học Y đến 9 lần. Thế nhưng, mẹ cô lại không hề có ý định dừng lại. Và rồi, chuyện gì đến cũng sẽ phải đến...

altTitles.ja: 泣き虫とココアの百合

title.en: Kanojo to Kare no Kankei ~Heibon na Hayakawa-san to Heibon na Miura-kun no Hibon na Kankei~

altTitles.ja: 彼女と彼の関係 〜平凡な早川さんと平凡な三浦くんの非凡な関係〜

description.en:
"I wish I had a girlfriend, I don't even care who—"
"Really? Anybody? Even me?"

Kaho, who has never had a boyfriend before, wanted to have a male-female relationship.
Takumi, who wanted a girlfriend, just happened to be talking about it in front of her.

---
Alternate Raws: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8556)
description.ja:
「誰でもいいから、彼女になってくれんかねー」
「本当に誰でもいい？　私でも？」

男女交際に興味があるのに、彼氏はいたことがない高校２年生の早川夏帆。ある日、同級生の三浦拓海が彼女を欲しがっていることを知って、勢い余ってその場で交際を申し込んでしまった！履歴書で自己紹介、「恋人とやりたいことリスト」の共有、初めてのふれあい――。二人の不思議な関係は「お試し交際」を通じて段々深まっていって……!?
description.pt-br:
"Eu quero tanto uma namorada que me contentaria com qualquer uma a esta altura." 
"Sério? Qualquer uma? Até mesmo eu?" 

Kaho, que nunca teve um namorado antes, queria entrar em um relacionamento entre um homem e mulher.
Takumi, que queria uma namorada, por acaso estava falando sobre isso na frente dela. Uma história de amor emocionante sobre amadurecimento!

title.en: Koukyuu wo Tsuihousareta Kitai no Akujo wa Rikyuu de Aiken wo Mofumofu shitetai

altTitles.en: The Rare Villainess Who Was Banished From the Inner Palace Wants A Mofumofu Life With Her Pet Dog in the Detached Palace

altTitles.ja: 後宮を追放された稀代の悪女は離宮で愛犬をモフモフしてたい

description.en: Jelun (Jie Lun) is the emperor of Yauzu (Yang Zi), an abundant country blessed by the protection of a divine beast. As a result of her father's' military achievements, Li Lanlei (Li Lan Ling) is appointed as one of the emperor's consorts. However, owing to her naturally sour countenance that easily gets her misunderstood, she has yet to see the emperor even once in the year that she has been living in the palace. One day, she is falsely accused of poisoning Meihi, another one of the emperor's consorts, and ends up being banished to the cold palace. Though she is banished on false charges, a surprisingly fun lifestyle was waiting before her?!
description.ja:
冤罪で追放…しかし意外と楽しい追放生活？

皇帝の妃である蘭玲（ランレイ）は、誤解されやすい悪女顔が原因で、皇帝の寵姫・明妃（メイヒ）毒殺未遂の冤罪を着させられ離宮への追放が決まってしまい…！？

title.en: Dungeon no Aru Sekai de Kashikoku Sukoyaka ni Ikiru Houhou

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンのある世界で賢く健やかに生きる方法

altTitles.en: How to Live Wisely and Healthily in a World with Dungeons

description.en: Ten years ago, dungeons suddenly appeared all over the world. Yuma Minashiro fell into a dungeon on his way to a job interview. With no equipment and resigned to his death, Yuma obtained an incredible skill: summoning. It was tough because all the spirits he summoned were beautiful girls, and the only way to become stronger was to flirt with them, but he set up a company, made money, and lived a happy life as a dungeon explorer.
description.ja: 10年前、突如世界中にダンジョンが出現した。皆城悠真は就活面接へ向うその途中、ダンジョンに落ちてしまう。何の装備も持たずに死を覚悟する悠真は、とんでもない＜スキル＞召喚術を手に入れる。召喚で出てくる精霊が軒並み美少女だったり、強くなる方法がその美少女たちとイチャイチャすることだったりして大変だけど、会社を設立したりお金を稼いだりしてダンジョン探索者として楽しく生きていきます。

altTitles.ja: はるかリセット

description.en:
Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. 
Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public baths, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... 
even if she can't take a big vacation or travel too far, she's determined to still enjoy any little "vacation" she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.ja: 紛争でしたら八田まで

altTitles.en: In Case of a Dispute, Contact Hatta

description.en: When ethnicities, languages and thoughts mingle together, there's no way of avoiding conflicts. Now of course, if you change your place of residence, the nature of conflicts that occur will also change! Therefore, Hatta Yuri a geopolitical risk consultant tries to solve the ethnic problems in Southeast Asia, the terrible incidents that occur in Africa, and the corporate problems that occur in Europe!?
description.ja: イギリスに本社がある企業に地政学リスクコンサルタントとして勤める八田百合。彼女の仕事は、地政学に基づいた知性と、ちょっとの荒技で世界中の事件を解決すること。そんな彼女に依頼を出してきたのは、ミャンマーにある日本の企業だった…。

altTitles.ja: 伝説の男の娘もっこり配信者

description.en:
A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)
description.id: Seorang cowok cantik mencoba mengolok-olok penonton om-om dengan Steaming sambil cross-dressing dan memamerkan tubuh montoknya!! Namun, tidak disangka dia mendapatkan popularitas karena hal lain...!?
description.ja:
配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

title.en: I am the World's Strongest, because I can read MANGA

altTitles.ja-ro: Manga wo Yomeru Ore ga Sekai Saikyou ~Yometachi to sugosu kimama na seikatsu~
Manga wo Yomeru Ore ga Sekai Saikyou

altTitles.ja: マンガを読めるおれが世界最強～嫁達と過ごす気ままな生活～

description.en:
The other world I reincarnated to, was a world that will enable you to use magic after reading a Grimoire.
And the Grimoire’s contents areーーYou wouldn’t believe it, it’s「Manga」.
This world’s people would take around one year to read one Grimoire(Manga) But for me, it is a「Manga」, that’s why it would not take an hour.
Interpreting and understanding all kinds of Grimoires and the 6 year old me who became the World’s Strongest Master Mage,
Welcomed brides that were also 6 years old, and started living a carefree life……!!
description.fr: Le monde dans lequel je me suis réincarné est un monde qui permet d'utiliser la magie après avoir lu un Grimoire. Et le contenu de ce Grimoire est... Un manga! Les gens de ce monde prennent environ un an pour lire un Grimoire (manga), mais pour moi, cela dure seulement moins d'une heure. Interprétant et comprenant toutes sortes de Grimoires, je suis devenu le plus puissant mage du monde à seulement 6 ans!

title.en: RTA Sousha wa Game Sekai kara Kaerenai

altTitles.ja: RTA走者はゲーム世界から帰れない

altTitles.ja-ro: RTA Sousha ha Game Sekai kara Kaerenai

altTitles.en: Speedrunner cannot Return from the Game World
RTA Runner cannot Return from the Game World

altTitles.vi: Bị nhốt trong thế giới game, tôi "speedrun" sạch map

description.en: Our protagonist, the speedrunning emperor of *Another Verse*, suddenly feels sleepy in the middle of practice. When he awakens, the familiar opening of *Another Verse* is playing right before his eyes!? In this godly environment where his body is moving better than usual, he has to speedrun! Clearing the game world faster than anyone!
description.ja: RTA（リアルタイムアタック）を極めた男がゲームの世界に召喚された!? 勇者として魔王を倒してほしいと言われるが、バグ技で即RTA攻略してしまう。しかし、ラスボスを倒したのにゲームが終わらなくて…？

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん
ロストマン

description.en: There lives a man who has lost his memory and can’t remember where he’s from, and who he is, including his name. He just goes by the name Matsumoto and the one and only thing he remembers is how to play soccer. However, the one thing he does remember, he does exceptionally well, even better than the professionals. He sells his ridiculous soccer skills to teams and guarantees them goals and, even more important, wins. As he travels from city to city, country to country playing for money, he hopes that he regains his memory.

altTitles.ja: 《魔力無限》のマナポーター ～パーティの魔力を全て供給していたのに、勇者に追放されました。魔力不足で聖剣が使えないと焦っても、メンバー全員が勇者を見限ったのでもう遅い～

description.en:
Thanks to his infinite mana Ishua has been working as a mana porter to the hero party. Doing a perfect task of supplying mana to the party members who consumed a lof of MP and earning the trust of his companions. However, Alan, the hero decides to banish him from the party in a fit of jealousy. "We don't need a mana porter!"

And chasing after Ishua through the forest Aria, the saint, appears wishing to continue adventuring with Ishua. The story of the banished strongest mana porter begins here!
description.ja: 生まれ持った無限の魔力で、マナポーターとして勇者パーティ全員の魔力供給を担ってきたイシュア。だが彼は、ある日突然、理不尽な理由でパーティを追放されてしまう。落胆するイシュアのもとに、彼を追ってきたパーティ仲間の聖女アリアの姿が。実は追放は勇者の独断で、彼女はイシュアが自分たちを見捨てたと思い、連れ戻しに来たのだった。真実を知ったアリアはパーティ脱退を決意し、イシュアは彼女と二人で旅を始めることになる。追放された最強マナポーターと、彼を追放した勇者。二人の対照的な冒険が今始まる!!

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生　エスケープ編

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High School - Escape Arc

description.en: Adaption of Light Novel 24-25.
description.ja: 七賢人を名乗るレイモンド・クラークにより、「トーラス・シルバー」の正体が司波達也であると暴露されてしまった。USNAが提唱するディオーネー計画への参加を巡って世界中が達也の動向に注目し、深雪たちが通う魔法科高校も好奇の目に晒される事態に。だが達也はかねてより進めていたプロジェクトを利用して、世界を裏から操ろうとする者たちに反旗を翻す――!!

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

altTitles.ja: しかのこのこのここしたんたん

description.en:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?

Trivia:
- The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this, physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.
description.ja: 出会いはある朝、彼女のツノが電線に引っかかっていたから………!?うっかり変なツノの生えた女の子を助けたことで優等生（の皮を被った）虎視虎子の人生が大混乱に!?一人の少女（元ヤン）が一人のシカ（？）に出会うガール・ミーツ・シカ物語（コメディ）開幕!!

altTitles.ja: 着せ替え人形でchu♡

description.en: The spin-off of "My Dress-Up Darling", [Kisekae Ningyou de Chu ♡], has started serialization with a chaotic yet cute vibe

altTitles.ru: Злодейская дочь и мисс Королева демон

altTitles.vi: Thiên kim phản diện và tiểu thư ma vương

altTitles.en: The Daughter of Evil & Miss Devil

altTitles.ja: 魔法が使えない悪役令嬢に転生しました

description.en:
Two girls, hand-in-hand, cross over to another world, into a magical academy set in a melodramatic Western fantasy novel. They transform into two people completely unrecognizable to each other: One is a rich villainess who is incapable of using any kind of magic, while the other is a young girl extremely talented in the field of magic, who's said to be the reincarnation of the Demon Lord. Originally set to save the world, the two of them unexpectedly fall in love.

"Male lead, female lead, may you two live a long and happy life together, forever. I, the villainess, am going to elope with Miss Demon Lord!"

altTitles.ja: 不死無敵

description.en:
From a thieving child to one who would shake the world. Rising to the title of Immortal Master, one of the Godly Twelve Stars, but ultimately betrayed. Now, he has been given a chance to change that, and create a better future- for both him, and the world. Based on the popular novel of the same name.

孤児として育ち、三十年以上もの辛く厳しい歳月を耐え抜いた後、「不死尊」という名が与えられた。 そして最後は濡れ衣を着せられ、血生臭い生涯を終えた。 しかし、気がつくと赤ん坊の姿に！？ 「不死尊」の記憶を持ったまま名家の息子「荘雲」として生まれ変わったのだ！

От вороватого ребенка до того, кто потрясет мир. Он взошёл к званию Бессмертного мастера, одной из двенадцати Божественных звезд, но в конце концов его предали. Теперь у него появился шанс изменить это и создать лучшее будущее — и для себя, и для целого мира.

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん
Hiiragi-san is a little careless.

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

altTitles.ja: あまあま

description.en: Yuji's girlfriend Misaki may seem hard and cold on the outside, but inside she's actually soft and loving. As they prepare for their high school entrance exams, Misaki decides that they should temporarily cut off all their dating activities. Will they be able to study hard enough through this period to get into the same high school?

title.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

description.en: The year is 1294, and war rages. Lucas, the bugler of a small mercenary band, is endlessly thrown into battle after battle, but longs for the day that he can fulfill his wish of becoming a real musician. One fateful day, however, Lucas's latent powers awaken and his life takes a drastic turn. Under the guidance of the Pope, Lucas is tasked to become a key player in the war and lead the fight against the Empire and its agent of destruction, the Garland. Burdened by this dangerous mission, Lucas still longs for the day that he may see his wish come true…
description.fr:
Transcender le fracas des armes, décider du sort de la bataille !
Luka, orphelin recueilli par le chef d'un groupe de mercenaires, n'est pas comme les autres : une branche pousse sur son crâne et il peut voir les sons, matérialisés par des traits de lumière... Le seul à lui parler sans crainte est son père adoptif, aussi fin stratège qu'impitoyable au combat. À 14 ans, Luka a déjà vu assez d'horreurs pour une vie. En tant que clairon, il est de tous les affrontements, transmettant les ordres via son instrument. En réalité, il n'a qu'une envie : échapper à ce quotidien fait de violence pour devenir musicien...


Seulement, la bataille qui s'annonce pourrait être sa dernière : cette fois, il doit prendre les armes... et, surtout, parmi ses opposants se trouvent d'autres "branchus' dotés de divers pouvoirs surnaturels ! Ils font un massacre dans les rangs de Luka, et ce dernier, blessé, se saisit d'un clairon pour sonner la retraite... C'est alors que son véritable pouvoir se dévoile : tous ses alliés visualisent le son de son instrument et ses indications résonnent comme des ordres dans la tête des soldats de son camp ! Le garçon les sauve grâce aux stratégies de son père adoptif.


Témoins de son exploit, les énigmatiques adversaires s'emparent de lui. Luka s'éveille dans une ville entourant une tour immense, vestige des temps anciens et source de magie... Ses nouveaux compagnons sont les protecteurs du lieu, régi par un mystérieux pape. Celui-ci passe un accord avec Luka : si le garçon met son pouvoir et son don tactique à son service, il l'aidera à devenir musicien. Sans le savoir, le jeune prodige se retrouve embarqué dans une guerre dont les enjeux le dépassent !


La lumière du son, seul espoir dans l'horreur des batailles... D'un trait vif et nerveux, une nouvelle génération d'auteurs invente un monde de dark fantasy sans concession. Mais ici, pas de héros surdoué au combat, juste un garçon rêvant de musique... Et pourtant, de ses talents dépend l'issue du conflit !

altTitles.ja: 魔王使いの最強支配

altTitles.en: The Demon King Tamer's Strongest Domination

description.en: For incompetence, Lewin, a Demon-Tamer adventurer, was banished from the hero's party. Without being acknowledged for his achievements as a commanding officer... However, the moment he comes into contact with Sasha, the Demon King of Death, one of the sealed Seven Demon Kings, he awakens to become a Demon King with the ability to subjugate Demon Kings! Moreover, by shattering the seal, he tames the Demon King, Sasha—— Lewin, backed by Sasha, succeeds in drawing out the Demon King's power and works to subdue all Demon Kings, the root of the strife between the humans and the demons.
description.ja: 魔物使いの冒険者・ルインは無能として勇者パーティーを追放された。しかし、封印された七魔王の一人、死の魔王・サシャを見つけた瞬間、彼は魔王を従える力をもつ魔王使いに覚醒!! さらに封印を解くと同時に、魔王・サシャをテイムしてしまい――サシャを仲間とし、魔王の力を引き出すことに成功したルインは、人と魔族の争いの原因である全ての魔王を従えようと動き出す。

title.en: Classmate wa Isekai de Yuusha ni Natta kedo, Ore dake Gendai Nihon ni Okizari ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトは異世界で勇者になったけど、俺だけ現代日本に置き去りにされました

altTitles.en: My Classmates Became Heroes in Another World, But I was Left Behind in Modern Japan

description.en:
"Congratulations! You 25 have been chosen as heroes to save the world!"

Just before summer vacation in their third year of middle school, the class is suddenly transported to another world by the goddess Ashera. The 26 students are given statuses that allow them to use skills and cheat abilities to become heroes in the other world. However, the number of students transported is 25—leaving behind Iori Shu, the boy who had just transferred and wasn’t counted.

While his classmates train in the other world to prepare for their battles as heroes, Shu remains in peaceful Japan, devoting himself to studying the status he was given. Quietly experimenting with his skills, he occasionally uses them to help those around him. But before he realizes it, Shu has become a target of various organizations around the world—!?
description.ja:
「おめでとう！　君たち25人は世界を救う勇者に選ばれました！」

中学3年の夏休み前、突然現れた女神・アシェラによって行われたクラス単位の異世界転移。
26人の生徒は異世界で勇者になれるよう、スキルやチート能力を使うことができるステータスを与えられ転移させられる。しかしその人数は25人――転校したばかりでカウントされていなかった少年・伊織修は現代日本に置き去りにされた。

異世界で鍛練し、来る勇者としての戦いに備えるクラスメイトとは違い、平和な日本で修は与えられたステータスの研究に没頭する。密かにスキルの性能の試行錯誤をしつつ、その力で時折身の回りの人助けをしていた修だが、いつの間にか世界の組織から狙われるような存在になっていて――？
